result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Alejandro J Sandoval

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Alejandro J Sandoval appeared by video. Student Intern Grace Sinclair under the supervision of Attorney Andrew Joel Golden in court for Alejandro J Sandoval.  Attorney Mallory R Davis in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Scheduling conference held. Defense counsel requests a plea and sentencing hearing. Case is adjourned to Br. 29.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for January 5, 2023 at 09:30 am.

Defendant Alejandro J Sandoval appeared by video.  Attorney Andrew Joel Golden in court for Alejandro J Sandoval.  Prosecuting attorney Katie Bakunowicz for Mallory Davis in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case set for a preliminary hearing. Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing.  Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed.  Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial. Defense acknowledges receipt of the Information, waives reading and enters a plea of not guilty on behalf of his client. Case is adjourned to Br. 29.
Scheduling conference scheduled for November 1, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
Defendant waived time limits for Preliminary Hearing.

Defendant Alejandro J Sandoval appeared by video. Attorney Andrew Joel Golden appeared by video for Alejandro J Sandoval.  Prosecuting attorney Jessica Ann Behling appeared on behalf of Mallory Davis by video for the State of Wisconsin. Case in court for Preliminary hearing. Court conducted Indigency Hearing. Court held colloquy with defendant. Court found defendant is eligible for appointment of counsel by court. Defendant requested court appointed counsel and agreed to reimburse Milwaukee County for the expense. The court appointed Atty. Golden, present in court, to represent defendant in this matter at County expense and at the rate of $100.00 per hour. The court ordered the defendant repay the County at a rate of $50.00 per month beginning at the completion of the case, and then the 1st of each month there after. Court advised defendant failure to pay will result in a civil judgment. Signed, Distributed & Filed, Order Appointing Attorney at County Expense. Preliminary hearing adjourned for cause to Br 29.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for September 21, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Court ordered Justice Point Pretrial Services LEVEL 1 SUPERVISION.  Court reminders.
No contact order signed and filed.

Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with AH (DOB 10/4/15).  Court advised Defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Alejandro J Sandoval in court with attorney Margo Elise Clark.  Defendant Alejandro J Sandoval in custody.  Erin Michelle Karshen appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Alejandro J Sandoval appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Kiefer Branch 29.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT DOES NOT QUALIFY FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION IF RELEASED FROM CUSTODY.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for September 2, 2022 at 08:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Alejandro J Sandoval
Current: 3203 N 47th St Upper, Milwaukee, WI 53219 United States  (Effective: 08-14-2022)
Prior: 542 Southtowne Drive #T102, South Milwaukee, WI 53204
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
